document_data.name: Chant of Fangs
document_data.mainbody: '''''Chant of fangs''''' was an [[evocation]]/[[necromancy]] [[spell]] that conjured a maw of spectral fangs that attacked any person or creature the [[cleric]] wished.
document_data.Effects:
When cast, ''chant of fangs'' created two rows of [[magic]]al, floating fangs that resembled an open jaw. They pursued and attacked any target the caster wished, independent of their actions. The bite of the ''fangs'' stole life energy rather than inflicted physical damage.

The ''fangs'' could be destroyed by magical means, such as ''[[dispel magic]]'', but not by mundane means.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Somatic component|somatic]] and [[verbal component]]s, along with the tooth of a wild, predatory mammal. Per its name, the verbal component consisted of loud chanting.
document_data.History: This specifications of ''chant of fangs'' were inscribed within the [[Malar]]ite [[relic]], the ''[[Book of Fangs and Talons]]''.
